titleStmt.title: The prices and rates that euerye perticuler person ovveth to pay for his fayre or passage, vnto watermen, or whyrrymen from Londo[n] to Grauesende, and likewise from Grauesende to London, and to euery commen landyng place, betwene the sayd two places, and the rates and pryces also of an hole fare in a whyrye, tylte bote, or tyde bote, to and from any of the said places hereafter breyfelye appeareth.
titleStmt.author: Watermen's Company (London, England)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London, England.
